item.title: Rising Shadows Trilogy 6: Earthmother's Eye Trilogy [BUNDLE]
item.description:
Publisher: Dungeon Masters Guild


Earthmother's Eye Trilogy


Answer the call of two worlds before darkness unites them forever!


Venture across planes as a newly opened moonwell bridges the Feywild and the Material, forging an alliance between mortals and fey. Heroes are called to stabilize shifting rifts and defend both worlds from a gathering darkness, lest the Moonshae Isles succumb to planar chaos. Will your heroics restore balance or let the promise of unity fall to ruin?


With three 4-hour adventures for your Tier 2 players, this bundle has everything you need to continue or begin your heroic journey in the renowned Rising Shadows campaign.


Brought to life under the creative direction of the Rising Shadows Story Architect Eric Menge and Trilogy Lead Amy Lynn Dzura, this bundle includes contributions from the following writers: A.S. Evrard, Emily Harmon, Diana Voyer


Bundle Cover: "The Voyage of Life: Youth" by Thomas Cole, on display at the National Gallery of Art. Remember to visit and support your local art museum!


Adventures Included in the Bundle

MOON6-1 A Reopened Eye: Conflicts arising in both the Feywild and the Prime have caused some in both planes to call for a return of the Balance, and for new alliances between the fey and mortals. A seer new to the Moonshaes has prophesied your help in opening a new portal between these worlds. Are you up to the task?

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 38 pages of content

  • 2 battle maps

  • 4 illustrated NPCs

MOON6-2 Troubled Visions: A newly opened moonwell proves unstable. An eladrin community in the Feywild calls for aid, as their home has been torn asunder and transformed by planar rifts. You must enter the moonwell to seal the rifts threatening the region before this instability pours over to the Prime Material.

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 39 pages of content

  • 1 battle map

  • 3 illustrated NPCs

MOON6-3 Planar Convergence: After a moonwell portal is permanently opened to the Feywild, fey and humans have begun to live together in harmony. But when a new threat forms on the horizon, darkness threatens to overwhelm the moonwell and consume the Moonshae Isles. As the fey and human denizens rush to mount defenses, will their alliance be enough to defeat the coming army?

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 42 pages of content

  • 2 battle maps

  • 4 illustrated NPCs

  • 1 illustrated handout

item.description:
Publisher: Dungeon Masters Guild


Tides of Blood Trilogy


Fire and fury descend on Gnarhelm!


Farmsteads burn in the hills of old Gnarhelm in northern Alaron, where vicious reavers strike with bloodthirsty fervor and leave only ruin in their wake. As terror grips the land, heroes must rise to repel this new menace, uncover its hidden mastermind, and stop an even greater threat from emerging. Will you restore peace to these troubled hills or let a darker horror loom on the horizon?


With three 4-hour adventures for your Tier 2 players, this bundle has everything you need to continue or begin your heroic journey in the renowned Rising Shadows campaign.


Brought to life under the creative direction of the Rising Shadows Story Architect Eric Menge and Trilogy Lead Pieter Sleijpen, this bundle includes contributions from the following writers: Garret Colón, Ben Sandfelder, Stephen Rowe


Bundle Cover: "Mount Corcoran" by Albert Bierstadt, on display at the National Gallery of Art. Remember to visit and support your local art museum!


Adventures Included in the Bundle

MOON5-1 Bloodlust Rising: When it was just livestock, few took note. When people disappeared, things changed. Now farmsteads are burning and bloodthirsty cackling echo through the hills of old Gnarhelm in northern Alaron. The farmers are defenseless against such bloodlust; can heroes help?

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 29 pages of content

  • 2 battle maps

MOON5-2 Bloodlust Contained: An unexpected enemy has appeared, attacking with ferocious bloodlust and unknown purpose. The locals can't defend against this threat forever; heroes are needed to discover who is responsible for the attacks and stop them for good.

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 26 pages of content

  • 2 battle maps

MOON5-3 Bloodlust Tempered: With the marauders gone, peace returns to northern Alaron, but somebody brought the reavers across the straits of Moonshae to Alaron. They need to be stopped before the recent troubles become nothing more than the vanguard of something worse.

This module includes:

item.title: FR-DC-FET02_Vatras Abyss
item.description:
Publisher: Dungeon Masters Guild

FR-DC-FET-02 Vatras Abyss

The second part of the Fire Emperor Trilogy

Deep in the dark halls of Maaruhbar, a forgotten dwarf city in the Earthspur Mountains, an ominous war is raging. The dreaded red dragon Vatras—the so-called Fire Emperor—has been challenged by an army of duergar under the command of the death giantess Clauthya. But that's not the only evil lurking in the shadows: a cunning devil named Desariel is pursuing his own sinister goals and recruiting unsuspecting adventurers for his schemes.

In this dark middle part of an epic trilogy, players explore a ruined dwarf kingdom, become embroiled in deadly conflicts between cultists, duergar, and ancient horrors, and face an adversary who challenges death itself in the name of the Raven Queen. Only those who combine courage, cunning, and determination will survive the next stage of this adventure.

A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 10.


Inside you find:

- The Adventure Module together with lots of Images, Handouts and Tokens.

- Individual drawn Maps of the dwarven city of Maaruhbar and of different encounter places bellow the city, ready to import into VTT like Roll20.

- Specially designed landing page in the artstyle of the Adventures module

- More Specificly designed Random Encounters inside a consecutive story with individual story awards.

- Multiple Pictures and Individual NPC-Tokens

CONTENT WARNING:BLOOD, GORE, VIOLENCE

Images were generated with artificial intelligence for the adventure.


Price: $4.99

item.title: Rising Shadows Trilogy 3: Fairheight Trilogy [BUNDLE]
item.description:
Publisher: Dungeon Masters Guild


Fairheight Trilogy


Ancient ways, ancient boons, ancient curses


Journey deep into the Fairheight Range, where dwarven clans reel from a devastating defeat and turn to outsiders for help. Rally with Clan Rookoath and Clan Rustfire to reclaim the tunnels of Dwarvenholm and protect the lost Cairnwell moonwell, a source of untold power that could save, or doom, their ancestral lands. Will you restore hope to these once-mighty halls, or watch an ancient threat consume all that the dwarves hold dear?


With three 4-hour adventures for your Tier 2 players, this bundle has everything you need to continue or begin your heroic journey in the renowned Rising Shadows campaign.


Brought to life under the creative direction of the Rising Shadows Story Architect Eric Menge and Trilogy Lead Shawn Merwin, this bundle includes contributions from the following writers: Ted Atkinson, Kat Kruger, Shawn Merwin


Bundle Cover: "Memories of the Giant Mountains" by Caspar David Friedrich, on display at the Hermitage Museum. Remember to visit and support your local art museum!


Adventures Included in the Bundle

MOON3-1 Atop the Fairheights: Just as it looked like the combined forces of Clan Rookoath and Clan Rustfire might drive a long-time threat from their ancestral homes, the dwarven forces suffer a terrible defeat. The proud and slightly xenophobic dwarves reach out for assistance. But is it too late, or can a group of heroes turn the tide?

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 25 pages of content

  • 4 battle maps

MOON3-2 Within the Tunnels of Dwarvenholm: With the immediate threat to Clans Rookoath and Rustfire quelled, the next step is to clear the tunnels of Dwarvenholm, allowing the clans to again move freely between their homes. However, the enemy will not give up their gains so easily, as a new player enters the battlefield.

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 28 pages of content

  • 5 battle maps

MOON3-3 Beneath the Cairnwell: The lost moonwell, known as the Cairnwell, plays a significant role in the battle for the Fairheight Range. Can it be saved and turned into a source of weal for the dwarves, or will the enemy take its power and turn it into a fountain of woe?

This module includes:

  • One 4-hour adventure

  • 27 pages of content

  • 3 battle maps


Sample Pages





Ready to explore even more of the Moonshaes? Visit Moonshaes.com to continue your journey and uncover new adventures and endless possibilities. The Isles await!

About Baldman Games

Baldman Games is a premier organizer appearing at major conventions across the U.S. and beyond. Since 2001, we've grown from hosting small regional events in NE Ohio (All Americon & MVC) to major conventions including Origins, Winter Fantasy, Magiccon, Gen Con, and PAXU.


Our organized play journey began in 2011 with Ashes of Athas, an in-house Dark Sun campaign. We later contributed to Adventurers League in 2018 with Rising Shadows, set in the Moonshae Isles. Our presence expanded in 2023 with DRW: Obscured Devotions, Moonshaes: Malefic Delusions, and Dragonlance: Vault of the Undying. In 2024, we continued with Moonshaes: Promise of Blossoms and DRW: Kindred Spirits. Moving forward in 2025, you will find we are a major contributor to the new organized play campaign, Legends of Greyhawk!
